articles.description: Brazil forward Neymar will miss the 2024 Copa América in the United States because of a serious knee injury suffered in October, Brazilian team doctor Rodrigo Lasmar said Tuesday.
articles.content:
Brazil forward Neymar will miss the 2024 Copa América in the United States because of a serious knee injury he suffered in October, Brazilian team doctor Rodrigo Lasmar said Tuesday.
